<template>
  <el-radio-group v-model="isCollapse" style="margin-bottom: 20px">
  </el-radio-group>
  <el-menu
      :default-active="path"
      router
      :collapse="isCollapse"
      class="el-menu-vertical-demo"
      style="width: 150px;
      min-height: calc(100vh - 50px)">
    <el-sub-menu index="1" v-if="user.role == 1">
      <template #title >
        âš™ï¸ ç®¡ç†</template>
      <el-menu-item index="/user" >
        ğŸ§¸ ç”¨æˆ·

    </el-menu-item>
    <el-sub-menu >
      <template #title >

      <el-menu-item index="/bbs" >
        ğŸ“– é¦–é¡µ

      <el-menu-item index="/bbsStudy" >

      <el-menu-item index="/bbsFood">

    </el-sub-menu>
  </el-menu>
</template>

<script>

import request from "@/utils/request";

export default {
  name: "Aside",
  data(){
    return{
      user:{},
      path:this.$route.path,//è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤é«˜äº®
      isCollapse:true,
    }
  },
  created() {
    let userStr = sessionStorage.getItem("user") || "{}"
    this.user = JSON.parse(userStr)

    // // è¯·æ±‚æœåŠ¡ç«¯ï¼Œç¡®è®¤å½“å‰ç™»å½•ç”¨æˆ·çš„ åˆæ³•ä¿¡æ¯
    request.get("/api/user/" + this.user.id).then(res => {
      if (res.code === '0') {
        this.user = res.data
      }
    })
  },
}
</script>

<style>
